description: Percentage of medications that have an RxNorm Semantic Clinical Drug code.
bestPractice: C-CDA medication lists should contain medications coded as RxNorom Semantic Clinical Drugs. This means (for example) products on the level of 'loratadine 10mg oral tablet'.

grades.A: > 90% of medications have an RxNorm SCD code
grades.B: > 80% of medications have an RxNorm SCD code
grades.C: > 70% of medications have an RxNorm SCD code
grades.D: > 60% of medications have an RxNorm SCD code
grades.F: < 60% of medications have an RxNorm SCD code
